mil6.1.3:1.2_1: pabbajitassa vā sammāpaṭipattiṁ vaṇṇemi, gihī vā, bhikkhave,
mil6.1.3:1.2_2: pabbajito vā sammāpaṭipanno sammāpaṭipattādhikaraṇahetu ārādhako hoti ñāyaṁ dhammaṁ kusalan’ti.
mil6.1.3:1.3_1: gihī odātavasano kāmabhogī puttadārasambādhasayanaṁ ajjhāvasanto kāsikacandanaṁ paccanubhonto mālāgandhavilepanaṁ dhārento jātarūparajataṁ sādiyanto maṇikuṇḍalavicittamoḷibaddho sammāpaṭipanno ārādhako hoti ñāyaṁ dhammaṁ kusalaṁ,
mil6.1.3:1.3_2: pabbajitopi bhaṇḍukāsāvavatthavasano parapiṇḍamajjhupagato catūsu sīlakkhandhesu sammāparipūrakārī diyaḍḍhesu sikkhāpadasatesu samādāya vattanto terasasu dhutaguṇesu anavasesaṁ vattanto sammāpaṭipanno ārādhako hoti ñāyaṁ dhammaṁ kusalaṁ.
mil6.1.3:1.4_1: ko viseso gihino vā pabbajitassa vā?
mil6.1.3:2.2_1: pabbajitassa vā sammāpaṭipattiṁ vaṇṇemi, gihī vā, bhikkhave,
mil6.1.3:2.2_2: pabbajito vā sammāpaṭipanno sammāpaṭipattādhikaraṇahetu ārādhako hoti ñāyaṁ dhammaṁ kusalan’ti.
mil6.1.3:2.3_0: Evametaṁ, mahārāja, sammāpaṭipannova seṭṭho, pabbajitopi, mahārāja,
mil6.1.3:2.3_1: ‘pabbajitomhī’ti na sammā paṭipajjeyya, atha kho so ārakāva sāmaññā, ārakāva brahmaññā, pageva gihī odātavasano.
mil6.1.3:2.4_1: sammāpaṭipanno ārādhako hoti ñāyaṁ dhammaṁ kusalaṁ, pabbajitopi, mahārāja,
mil6.1.3:2.4_2: sammāpaṭipanno ārādhako hoti ñāyaṁ dhammaṁ kusalaṁ.
mil6.1.3:3.2_2: na sakkā pabbajjāya guṇaṁ parimāṇaṁ kātuṁ.
mil6.1.3:4.1_1: kāmadadassa maṇiratanassa na sakkā dhanena aggho parimāṇaṁ kātuṁ ‘ettakaṁ maṇiratanassa mūlan’ti;
mil6.1.3:4.2_2: na sakkā pabbajjāya guṇaṁ parimāṇaṁ kātuṁ.
mil6.1.3:5.1_1: mahāsamudde ūmiyo na sakkā parimāṇaṁ kātuṁ ‘ettakā mahāsamudde ūmiyo’ti;
mil6.1.3:5.2_2: na sakkā pabbajjāya guṇaṁ parimāṇaṁ kātuṁ.
mil6.1.3:6.1_1: sabbaṁ taṁ khippameva samijjhati no cirarattāya.
mil6.1.3:6.3_1: appiccho hoti santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṁsaṭṭho āraddhavīriyo nirālayo aniketo paripuṇṇasīlo sallekhitācāro dhutappaṭipattikusalo hoti,
mil6.1.3:6.3_2: taṁ kāraṇā pabbajitassa yaṁ kiñci karaṇīyaṁ,
mil6.1.3:6.3_3: sabbaṁ taṁ khippameva samijjhati no cirarattāya.
mil6.1.3:6.5_2: sabbaṁ taṁ khippameva samijjhati no cirarattāyā”ti.
